page.title: 19EVENTS AT THE ASHWELL SHOW
page.content: The Horse Show has continuous events ocurring in four rings. There are the usual classes for horses and ponies. The Driving Class for horse and trap undertakes a marathon ( about 5 or 6 miles through surronding countryside. Local shops, industries and Inns provide sponsorship for the events. This year the Cambridgeshire Foxhounds and the West Lodge Harehounds mustered and paraded. There is also a Dog Show, it is licensed by the Kennel Club and run by a nearby town dog training club. They decided on three classes, a novelty class, a pedigree class and an obedience class. Many local traders, organisations, charities, craftsmen and artists take trade stands, over sixty of them this year, in order to show their wares. There are also side shows like bingo, hoopla, coconut shy, and spin a bottle and a sweet stall.
